      • update

        public boolean update(Map currentmap,
                      char move)
        Verifies if the character is supposed to move,if such, the position of the character is changed
        Parameters:
        currentmap - map where the character position is set
        move - char that represents the move that the character is supossed to do
        Returns:
        true if the character has been moved, else returns false

      • verifyColision

        public boolean verifyColision(Character c)
        Verifies if a character is next to another (in an adjacent position, diagonal is not verified) or in the same position
        Parameters:
        c - character to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the two character are next to eachother (or in same pos) else return false

      • changePosition

        public void changePosition(char move,
                           boolean invertFlag)
        Function that precisely changes the temporary position of the character
        Parameters:
        move - char to represent the move the character is going to do (if 'w' it goes up one position, 'd' it goes right,..)
        invertFlag - flag to know if the move set is reverse,if is set true, for example case move = 'w' instead of going up it goes down one position

      • addElementsMatrix

        public void addElementsMatrix(char[][] map)
        Puts the character symbol on a char[][] in is exact position
        Parameters:
        map - matrix where the character symbol is set,represents the game map

      • getIsParalyzed

        public boolean getIsParalyzed()
        Gets the flag that shows if the character is supossed to be unable to move
        Returns:
        isParalyzed variable, true if the character is not supossed to move

        public void setIsParalyzed(boolean isParalyzed)
        Changes the isParalyzed variable to the function argument
        Parameters:
        isParalyzed - the new value of IsParalyzed
